00049 // DataLightSynapse definition
00050 // for synapses that share same weights and delays
00051 // contains a reference to the common data
00053 
00054 class DataLightSynapse
00055 {
00056 // construction
00057 protected:
00058     explicit DataLightSynapse(ConfigBase * const configurator);
00059 
00060 // members and accessors
00061 protected:
00062     inline const double & weight_impl() const {
00063         return data_ref_->weight();
00064     }
00065     inline const double & delay_impl() const {
00066         return data_ref_->delay();
00067     }
00068 private:
00069     const DataLightSynapseConfig * const data_ref_;
00070 };

00081         : data_ref_(dynamic_cast<DataLightSynapseConfig *>(configurator))
